recent_news: HITS (House of Insurtech Switzerland) is a Generali subsidiary running a 600m² corp-up studio in Zurich with 50+ startups in Insurtech, Fintech, GenAI, and blockchain
HITS has 20 startups in their Innovation Garage, actively seeking AI-first solutions in Q4 2025 / Q1 2026
The Global InsurTech Report Q3 2025 shows money concentrating in AI-first solutions in insurance
HITS has active collaborations with startups developing pilots for Generali DACH region
enrichment_data.outreach_angle: Mathias manages open innovation for HITS — the Generali-backed insurtech hub in Zürich. Kavach AI (AI security/monitoring platform) is directly relevant to insurance use cases — workplace safety, risk monitoring, and loss prevention are core insurer concerns. Bramha ESG is also relevant — Generali and insurers increasingly need ESG risk data on SME clients. Reach out: 'Mathias — following up on our connection. I have been building Kavach AI, an edge-AI security monitoring platform that reduces workplace incidents and insurance claims. Given HITS's focus on AI-first solutions, I would love to explore whether there is a pilot opportunity with Generali's DACH operations. Are you open to a 20-minute intro call this month?' Timeline: this month.
